title: Planning for localization Add RTL support in Layouts
Starting SDK 17 (Android 4.2), RTL support was added in Android layouts and is an essential part of localization. Going forward, the
left/right
c
notation in layouts should be replaced by
start/end
c
notation. If, however, your project has a
minSdk
c
value less than
c
, then both
left/right
c
and
start/end
c
notation should be used in layouts.

inline_content.Text: Starting SDK 17 (Android 4.2), RTL support was added in Android layouts and is an essential part of localization. Going forward, the
notation in layouts should be replaced by
notation. If, however, your project has a
notation should be used in layouts.

title:
<RelativeLayout
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent">
    <TextView
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
        android:layout_alignParentLeft="true"
        android:layout_alignParentStart="true"/>
    <TextView
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
        android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
        android:layout_alignParentEnd="true"/>
</RelativeLayout>

content_resolved.code:
<RelativeLayout
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent">
    <TextView
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
        android:layout_alignParentLeft="true"
        android:layout_alignParentStart="true"/>
    <TextView
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
        android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
        android:layout_alignParentEnd="true"/>
</RelativeLayout>

title: For specifying gravity and layout gravity, similar notation should be used, like so :

inline_content.Text: For specifying gravity and layout gravity, similar notation should be used, like so :

title:
<TextView
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_gravity="left|start"
    android:gravity="left|start"/>
<TextView
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_gravity="right|end"
    android:gravity="right|end"/>

content_resolved.code:
<TextView
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_gravity="left|start"
    android:gravity="left|start"/>
<TextView
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_gravity="right|end"
    android:gravity="right|end"/>

title: Paddings and margins should also be specified accordingly, like so :

inline_content.Text: Paddings and margins should also be specified accordingly, like so :

title:
<include layout="@layout/notification"
    android:layout_width="fill_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_marginLeft="12dp"
    android:layout_marginStart="12dp"
    android:paddingLeft="128dp"
    android:paddingStart="128dp"
    android:layout_toLeftOf="@id/cancel_action"
    android:layout_toStartOf="@id/cancel_action"/>
<include layout="@layout/notification2"
    android:layout_width="fill_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_marginRight="12dp"
    android:layout_marginEnd="12dp"
    android:paddingRight="128dp"
    android:paddingEnd="128dp"
    android:layout_toRightOf="@id/cancel_action"
    android:layout_toEndOf="@id/cancel_action"/>

content_resolved.code:
<include layout="@layout/notification"
    android:layout_width="fill_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_marginLeft="12dp"
    android:layout_marginStart="12dp"
    android:paddingLeft="128dp"
    android:paddingStart="128dp"
    android:layout_toLeftOf="@id/cancel_action"
    android:layout_toStartOf="@id/cancel_action"/>
<include layout="@layout/notification2"
    android:layout_width="fill_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_marginRight="12dp"
    android:layout_marginEnd="12dp"
    android:paddingRight="128dp"
    android:paddingEnd="128dp"
    android:layout_toRightOf="@id/cancel_action"
    android:layout_toEndOf="@id/cancel_action"/>
